summary: A player home near Whiterun. Free so good for a new character. Well equiped aswell.
descriptionHtml:
Heartwarmer Cottage is a medium sized farmhouse located about 50 meters north east of Battle-Born farm. It is well equipped and free of charge. You can access it from the start of the game which means it is very useful for a low level character. Also, it is in a convenient location if you have just started a new character.

I have updated it so it is now Navmeshed. There are new areas: the basement and the garden.
(No DLC required - do not know if compatible with DLC or other mods)

Features:
10 non-respawning chests
Smelter
Forge
Tanning rack
Grindstone
Armorerâ€™s workbench
Bed
Shrine of Talos
3 (small) non-respawning cupboards
1 (big) non-respawning cupboard
Bookshelf (only holds 6 books)
4 weapon plaques
Mannequin
+ Many more useful items


This is the updated version of the MOD and I have tried to include all the suggestions from the Skyrim Nexus.

Also available on the Steam Workshop
author: Bubmeister
